threats.prerequisites: with authorized access to the AWS accounts
threats.threatAction: modify the configuration of the AWS services and/or resources within the trust boundary
threats.threatImpact: a loss of trust in the services to behave as configured
threats.statement: An internal actor with authorized access to the AWS accounts can modify the configuration of the AWS services and/or resources within the trust boundary, which leads to a loss of trust in the services to behave as configured, negatively impacting assets within the trust boundary
